body:
We think this is a permissions problem, which we have fixed.


On 2010-11-22 14:39:23 -0800, Rob Guglielmetti said:


> Like the subject line says, this link 
> (http://www.radiance-online.org/software/non-cvs/rad4R0supp.tar.gz) 
> throws a perms error at you at the moment. The .bz2 archive link still 
> works, as does the HEAD release link. Probably a temporary thing, but 
> just in case not, here's this email about it, before I forget. =8-)




Randolph M. Fritz • RFritz at lbl.gov
Environmental Energy Technologies Division • Lawrence Berkeley Labs
